description: Try our easy to follow Sweet Potato Stuffed With Leftover Bolognese recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Stuffed vegetable,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Potato,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Leftover bolognese,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Sweet Potato Stuffed With Leftover Bolognese Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Place potatoes on a baking tray and bake for 50 minutes or until soft when inserting a skewer.
Meanwhile, place leftover bolognese sauce in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add black beans, corn and smoked paprika. Stir regularly until sauce is hot and corn is cooked.

Remove potatoes from oven. Cut lengthways into each potato to open. Add a couple of spoonfuls of bolognese sauce and top with tomato, spring onion and cheese. Dollop with sour cream and garnish with coriander. Serve.
